questions.question: What is the primary purpose of R-Squared in regression analysis?

answers.a: To determine the number of data points
answers.b: To measure the proportion of variance explained by the model
answers.c: To calculate the slope of the regression line
answers.d: To identify outliers in the dataset

questions.question: In weighted least squares regression, what does assigning different weights to data points indicate?

answers.a: The complexity of the mathematical calculation
answers.b: The relative importance or reliability of each data point
Strength of linear relationship between variables

questions.question: Which method minimizes the sum of squared differences between observed and predicted values?

answers.a: Model explains very little of the data variation
answers.b: Model fits the data extremely well

questions.question: Weighted least squares is useful when:

answers.b: Some observations have more reliability than others
answers.d: There is just one data point

questions.question: Which visualization is commonly used to show regression fit?
